dialogue.htmlContent:
As you enter yet another of Dominion's many parks, you see a curious scene unfolding before you. Several centaur-pulled carts are lined up nearby, and the naked, muscular centaurs who are responsible for hauling them are busily unloading what look to be at least a hundred saplings.
